decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The facing materials used in the development to which this permission relates shall match those of the existing building(s) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

All rooflights hereby permitted shall be conservation style rooflights set as flush as practicable within the roof slope. Reason: In the interests of heritage conservation and to ensure that the development preserves the character and appearance of the conservation area.

The works shall be carried in accordance with the Fire Safety Statement prepared by AJT Design dated Jan 23 and thereafter retained in accordance with the approved Statement. Reason: To ensure the highest standards of fire safety in accordance with Policy D12(A) of the London Plan 2021.
description: Erection of single storey side and rear extension, rear dormer extension  and changes to fenestration
